title: Highest Multilateral Debt Service
description: In 2023, Yemen had the highest multilateral debt service, accounting for 100% of its public and publicly guaranteed debt service.

title: Lowest Energy Use Per Capita
description: In 2022, Yemen had one of the lowest energy use per capita, with only 68.95 kg of oil equivalent per person.

title: Lowest Account Ownership Among Young Adults
description: In 2022, only 5.01% of young adults in Yemen had an account at a financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider.

title: Lowest Government Effectiveness
description: Yemen ranked extremely low in government effectiveness in 2023, with a percentile rank of 0.47.

title: Lowest CPIA Ratings for Budgetary and Gender Equality
description: In 2023, Yemen received the lowest possible CPIA ratings of 1 for both budgetary and financial management and gender equality.

title: Lowest Female Employment Ratio
description: In 2024, Yemen had one of the lowest female employment to population ratios, with only 3.46% of women aged 15+ employed.

title: Highest Prevalence of Anemia Among Children
description: In 2019, 79.5% of children aged 6-59 months in Yemen suffered from anemia, one of the highest rates globally.
